00024 #include "CVParam.hpp"
00025 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 #include <iterator>
00028 #include <algorithm>

00030 
00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace pwiz::util;
00033 using namespace pwiz::msdata;
00034 
00035 
00036 ostream* os_ = 0;
00037 
00038 
00039 class WriteCVParam
00040 {
00041     public:
00042 
00043     WriteCVParam(ostream& os) : os_(os) {}
00044 
00045     void operator()(const CVParam& param)
00046     {
00047         os_ << "<cvParam " 
00048             << "cvLabel=\"" << cvinfo(param.cvid).id.substr(0,2) << "\" "
00049             << "accession=\"" << cvinfo(param.cvid).id << "\" "
00050             << "name=\"" << cvinfo(param.cvid).name << "\" "
00051             << "value=\"" << param.value << "\"";
00052 
00053         if (param.units != CVID_Unknown)
00054         {
00055             os_ << " unitAccession=\"" << cvinfo(param.units).id << "\" "
00056                 << "unitName=\"" << cvinfo(param.units).name << "\""; 
00057         }
00058 
00059         os_ << "/>\n";
00060     }
00061 
00062     private:
00063     ostream& os_;
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 const char* mzmlScanTime = 
00068     "<cvParam cvLabel=\"MS\" accession=\"MS:1000016\" name=\"scan time\" value=\"5.890500\" "
00069     "unitAccession=\"MS:1000038\" unitName=\"minute\"/>\n";
00070 
00071 const char* mzmlCollisionEnergy = 
00072     "<cvParam cvLabel=\"MS\" accession=\"MS:1000045\" name=\"collision energy\" value=\"35.00\" "
00073     "unitAccession=\"MS:1000137\" unitName=\"electron volt\"/>\n";
00074 
00075 
00076 void test()
00077 {
00078     vector<CVParam> params;
00079 
00080     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_lowest_m_z_value, 420));
00081     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_highest_m_z_value, 2000.012345));
00082     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_m_z, "goober"));
00083     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_scan_time, 5.890500, MS_minute)); 
00084     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_collision_energy, 35.00, MS_electron_volt)); 
00085     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_deisotoping, true)); 
00086     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_peak_picking, false)); 
00087 
00088     if (os_)
00089     {
00090         *os_ << "params:\n";
00091         copy(params.begin(), params.end(), ostream_iterator<CVParam>(*os_, "\n")); 
00092         *os_ << endl;
00093     
00094         *os_ << "as mzML <cvParam> elements:\n";
00095         for_each(params.begin(), params.end(), WriteCVParam(*os_));
00096         *os_ << endl;
00097 
00098         *os_ << "value casting:\n";
00099         int temp = params[0].valueAs<int>();
00100         *os_ << temp << endl;
00101         float temp2 = params[1].valueAs<float>();
00102         *os_ << temp2 << endl;
00103         string temp3 = params[2].valueAs<string>();
00104         *os_ << temp3 << "\n\n";
00105     }
00106 
00107     // verify simple things
00108     unit_assert(420 == params[0].valueAs<int>());
00109     unit_assert(2000.012345 == params[1].valueAs<double>());
00110     unit_assert("goober" == params[2].value);
00111     unit_assert(5.890500 == params[3].valueAs<double>());
00112     unit_assert(35.00 == params[4].valueAs<double>());
00113     unit_assert(params[0] == CVParam(MS_lowest_m_z_value, 420));
00114     unit_assert(params[1] != CVParam(MS_lowest_m_z_value, 420));
00115     unit_assert(CVParam(MS_m_z) == MS_m_z);
00116     unit_assert(params[5].valueAs<bool>() == true);
00117     unit_assert(params[6].valueAs<bool>() == false);
00118 
00119     // verify manual mzml writing -- this is to verify that we have enough
00120     // info to write <cvParam> elements as required by mzML
00121 
00122     ostringstream ossScanTime;
00123     CVParam scanTime(MS_scan_time, "5.890500", MS_minute); 
00124     (WriteCVParam(ossScanTime))(scanTime);
00125     unit_assert(ossScanTime.str() == mzmlScanTime);
00126     if (os_) *os_ << "scan time in seconds: " << scanTime.timeInSeconds() << endl;
00127     unit_assert_equal(scanTime.timeInSeconds(), 5.8905 * 60, 1e-10);
00128 
00129     ostringstream ossCollisionEnergy;
00130     (WriteCVParam(ossCollisionEnergy))(CVParam(MS_collision_energy, "35.00", MS_electron_volt));
00131     unit_assert(ossCollisionEnergy.str() == mzmlCollisionEnergy);
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 void testIs()
00136 {
00137     vector<CVParam> params;
00138     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_plasma_desorption));
00139     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_lowest_m_z_value, 420));
00140     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_collision_induced_dissociation));
00141 
00142     vector<CVParam>::const_iterator it = 
00143         find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParam::Is(MS_lowest_m_z_value));
00144 
00145     unit_assert(it->value == "420");
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 void testIsChildOf()
00150 {
00151     // example of how to search through a collection of CVParams
00152     // to find the first one whose cvid IsA specified CVID
00153 
00154     vector<CVParam> params;
00155     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_lowest_m_z_value, 420));
00156     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_plasma_desorption));
00157     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_collision_induced_dissociation));
00158     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_electron_volt));
00159     params.push_back(CVParam(MS_highest_m_z_value, 2400.0));
00160 
00161     vector<CVParam>::const_iterator itDiss = 
00162         find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParam::IsChildOf(MS_dissociation_method));
00163 
00164     vector<CVParam>::const_iterator itUnit = 
00165         find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParam::IsChildOf(MS_unit));
00166 
00167     if (os_)
00168     {
00169         *os_ << "find dissociation method: " 
00170              << (itDiss!=params.end() ? cvinfo(itDiss->cvid).name : "not found")
00171              << endl;
00172 
00173         *os_ << "find unit: " 
00174              << (itUnit!=params.end() ? cvinfo(itUnit->cvid).name : "not found")
00175              << endl;
00176 
00177     }
00178 
00179     unit_assert(itDiss!=params.end() && itDiss->cvid==MS_plasma_desorption);
00180     unit_assert(itUnit!=params.end() && itUnit->cvid==MS_electron_volt);
00181 }
00182 
00183 
00184 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00185 {
00186     try
00187     {
00188         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00189         test();
00190         testIs();
00191         testIsChildOf();
00192         return 0;
00193     }
00194     catch (exception& e)
00195     {
00196         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00197     }
00198     
00199     return 1;
00200 }
